titleStmt.title: Eliza's babes or, the virgins-offering. Being divine poems, and meditations. Written by a lady, who onely desires to advance the glory of God, and not her own.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for Laurence Blaiklock, and are to be sold at his shop neer the Middle-Temple Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop neer the Middle-Temple Gate
